The film tells the story of Nathan (Gregoire Colin) who is at a countryside retreat for a family reunion. Claire, his wife, needs to announce her pregnancy and there are tough decisions that need to be taken to prevent the family business from going bankrupt. But on the first night they meet, and a deer appears mysteriously attacks Claire's father. The men decide to venture into the forest around the house to find the possible reasons for the strange behavior of the animal. Carrying a shotgun for the first time in his life and experiencing the growing tensions between the men in the family, Nathan soon discovers that hunting season is not over yet.
